requirement_tested: A form-filling function for users to input personal information and credit status
user_persona: A potential customer named Sarah who wants to improve her credit score.
user_goal: Sarah wants to submit her personal and credit information through the form to get help from the credit repair company.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing the Form
narrative_steps.description: Sarah visits the website and scrolls down to find the lead generation form.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the form section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A multi-field form with labels for First Name, Last Name, Email Address, Phone Number, Credit Score Dropdown, Credit Status Radio Buttons, Message Text Area, and a Submit Button is visible.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out the Form
narrative_steps.description: Sarah fills in her first name, last name, email address, and phone number. She selects her credit score and credit status, then adds a message.
narrative_steps.action: Enter data into all required fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each field accepts input correctly, and the Submit button becomes enabled.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Form
narrative_steps.description: After reviewing her entries, Sarah clicks the Submit button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form data is sent via POST request to the backend API, and a confirmation message appears confirming successful submission.

user_persona: A visitor named Mike curious about his estimated credit score.
user_goal: Mike wants to quickly estimate his credit score by entering his email address.

narrative_steps.title: Finding the Inquiry Section
narrative_steps.description: Mike scrolls to the 'Estimate Your Credit Score' section on the homepage.
narrative_steps.action: Locate the email input field and 'Check Now' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An input field labeled 'Email Address' and a Rosy Brown 'Check Now' button are visible.

narrative_steps.title: Entering His Email
narrative_steps.description: Mike enters his email address into the input field.
narrative_steps.action: Type a valid email address into the field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The email format is accepted, and the 'Check Now' button becomes active.

narrative_steps.title: Requesting Credit Estimate
narrative_steps.description: Mike clicks the 'Check Now' button to get his credit score estimate.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Check Now' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A loading spinner appears, and after processing, the estimated credit score range is displayed.

requirement_tested: An introduction section for credit repair services
user_persona: A new visitor named Lisa interested in learning about credit repair options.
user_goal: Lisa wants to understand what credit repair services are offered by the company.

narrative_steps.title: Discovering the Introduction Section
narrative_steps.description: Lisa lands on the homepage and notices a section titled 'Our Credit Repair Services'.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the services introduction section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A full-width section with left-aligned descriptive text and bullet points listing key offerings is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Reading About Services
narrative_steps.description: Lisa reads through the detailed explanation of credit repair benefits and supporting features.
narrative_steps.action: Read the content thoroughly.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Clear understanding of identity protection, credit monitoring, and legal dispute filing services.

requirement_tested: A lead submission feature to collect user information
user_persona: Returning user John who has already filled out the form once.
user_goal: John wants to ensure his information was properly saved in the system.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Lead Form Again
narrative_steps.description: John re-submits the same information through the lead form to verify storage.
narrative_steps.action: Complete and submit the lead form again.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System confirms successful submission and indicates that data was saved without duplication errors.

requirement_tested: A browsing interface for users to explore the website
user_persona: Casual browser Emma exploring the site for useful resources.
user_goal: Emma wants to navigate smoothly across different sections of the website.

narrative_steps.title: Using Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: Emma sees the fixed navigation bar at the top and decides to visit the Testimonials page.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Testimonials' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page scrolls smoothly to the testimonials section without a full reload.

requirement_tested: A responsive website layout with Old Lace background color
user_persona: Mobile user David accessing the site on his smartphone.
user_goal: David wants a seamless experience regardless of device size.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Site on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: David opens the website on his mobile phone and browses around.
narrative_steps.action: Load the site on a mobile screen resolution.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site adjusts layout appropriately with consistent Old Lace background and readable content.

requirement_tested: UI components styled with Rosy Brown color scheme
user_persona: Design-conscious user Olivia evaluating the site aesthetics.
user_goal: Olivia wants to confirm that the UI uses the correct brand colors.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting UI Elements
narrative_steps.description: Olivia inspects buttons, borders, and active states throughout the site.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the styling of interactive elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All buttons, borders, and active states consistently use Rosy Brown (#BC8F8F) as specified.

requirement_tested: A header navigation menu for easy site access
user_persona: First-time visitor Marcus looking for specific information.
user_goal: Marcus wants quick access to different parts of the site using the navigation menu.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Through Menu Items
narrative_steps.description: Marcus clicks on each menu item to see where they lead.
narrative_steps.action: Click on Home, Services, Testimonials, and Contact Us links.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each click scrolls smoothly to the corresponding section or loads the route dynamically without refreshing the whole page.

requirement_tested: A footer with contact information and legal links
user_persona: Privacy-conscious user Nina wanting to review legal terms.
user_goal: Nina seeks to locate and read the Privacy Policy easily.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Footer Links
narrative_steps.description: Nina scrolls to the bottom of the page to find the footer.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the footer area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Footer is visible with contact information and hyperlinked legal pages like Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Legal Page
narrative_steps.description: Nina clicks on the Privacy Policy link to read the details.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Privacy Policy' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She is navigated to a dedicated static page displaying the privacy policy content.

requirement_tested: A dedicated service description page for credit repair offerings
user_persona: Interested prospect Paul researching service packages.
user_goal: Paul wants to compare service tiers and decide which package suits him best.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Services Page
narrative_steps.description: Paul clicks on the 'Services' link from the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Services' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Paul is taken to a standalone page showing Bronze, Silver, and Gold plan features in tiered cards.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Plan Details
narrative_steps.description: Paul examines each plan's features, timeline expectations, and associated costs.
narrative_steps.action: Read through each service tier carefully.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Clear presentation of differences between plans helps Paul make an informed decision.

requirement_tested: A testimonials or success stories section
user_persona: Skeptical visitor Rachel needing reassurance before proceeding.
user_goal: Rachel wants to see real-life examples of improved credit scores.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Customer Stories
narrative_steps.description: Rachel scrolls to the testimonials carousel and observes customer photos and quotes.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the testimonials section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A scrollable panel shows customer avatars, brief quotes, and numerical improvements in credit scores.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Carousel
narrative_steps.description: Rachel clicks the navigation arrow to view more testimonials.
narrative_steps.action: Click the next arrow in the carousel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The carousel transitions smoothly to display another testimonial slide.

requirement_tested: A contact page with additional inquiry options
user_persona: Business user Tom wanting to discuss partnership opportunities.
user_goal: Tom aims to reach out specifically regarding business collaboration.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Contact Page
narrative_steps.description: Tom navigates to the 'Get In Touch' page to find specialized contact options.
narrative_steps.action: Go to the Contact Us page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Extended contact form with Subject dropdown and file upload option is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Detailed Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: Tom selects 'Partnership Request' from the subject dropdown, attaches a document, and submits the form.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in form fields, select subject, attach file, and click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form is submitted successfully with multipart/form-data encoding, and confirmation is shown.

requirement_tested: A privacy policy and terms of service page
user_goal: Uma wants to confirm that the company follows proper data handling practices.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Legal Pages
narrative_steps.description: Uma clicks on the 'Terms of Service' link in the footer.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Terms of Service' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Plain HTML page with clearly marked headings and subsections detailing contractual obligations is loaded.

requirement_tested: A backend API to handle form submissions and data storage
user_persona: Technical QA tester Kevin validating backend integration.
user_goal: Kevin wants to ensure the form data reaches the backend securely and gets stored.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Backend Response
narrative_steps.description: Kevin fills out the form and watches network activity during submission.
narrative_steps.action: Submit the lead form while monitoring network tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: POST request to /api/leads is observed with correct payload and receives a success response.

requirement_tested: A PostgreSQL database connection using specified environment variables
user_persona: DevOps engineer Linda ensuring infrastructure setup.
user_goal: Linda wants to verify the backend connects correctly to the configured PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Database Connection
narrative_steps.description: Linda reviews the backend configuration and checks if it uses the correct environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Verify DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, and DB_NAME values in backend config.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Backend successfully establishes a connection to the PostgreSQL instance using the exact environment variable settings.
